    Package Description
    com.iontrading.mkv
    The classes in this package pose the core of the ION Bus Java API.
    com.iontrading.mkv.events
    Provides Listener and Event interfaces used by the ION Bus Java API.

      Queries the entitlement requests cache.

      void MkvEntitlementManager.eval​(MkvEntitlementRequest req, MkvEntitlementRequestEvalListener lner)
      Request evaluation of an entitlement request, putting the request in a queue of pending evaluation.
      void MkvEntitlementManager.evalImmediate​(MkvEntitlementRequest req, MkvEntitlementRequestEvalListener lner)
      Request evaluation of an entitlement request, performing the evaluation in-stack with the caller.
